laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Cepheid nucleic acid amplification assay for C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile (Reference Range-Negative).

Small bilateral pleural effusions with associated atelectasis. Gallbladder decompressed with a pigtail catheter, no pericholecystic abnormality, no biliary duct dilation, normal pancreas, spleen, kidneys, and urinary system. Enlarged prostate. Mild atherosclerotic disease noted.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Subcentimeter hypodensity in segment II at the dome is unchanged.
